price: Lakini alipuuza kwa sababu ya nguvu zake na akasema: Huyu ni mchawi au mwendawazimu!
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ
footnotes: Firauni akapuuza kumuamini Musa kwa kutegemea ati nguvu zake. Akasema: Huyu ni mchawi au mwendawazimu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
